name: Prosperity
tag_list: digital-recruitment-ireland, online-recruitment-ireland, web-recruitment-ireland, media-recruitment-company-ireland, digital-recruitment-company-ireland, web-recruitment-agency-ireland, media-recruitment-agency-ireland, digital-recruitment-agency-ireland
overview:
Prosperity is Ireland’s only specialised digital communications recruitment agency. We specialise in absolutely everything to do with digital communications – design, development, content, sales, marketing, management & strategy.

We have been working for over 10 years with most of the digital and communications companies in Ireland, and we have successfully built development and communications teams for many leading brands.

We have built up an extensive database of specialist candidates and social media communities, and we have developed a vast array of top level contacts and networks.

While we source the majority of our candidates from within Ireland, if need be we look to the UK, Continental Europe and further afield. Our aim is simply to source the very best people for the roles we work.
